DATA_SAVE.TITLE: Data-Saving mode
DATA_SAVE.DESCRIPTION: Only a few suggestions, search results and delay messages are loaded to reduce data consumption.

DARK_THEME.TITLE: Dark mode
DARK_THEME.DESCRIPTION: Saves energy especially with OLED displays and looks aesthetic for various users. To make the changes effective, restart the app.

ANALYTICS.TITLE: Firebase Analytics
ANALYTICS.DESCRIPTION: Collects anonymous information about user behavior that helps us improve our app. Firebase Analytics is a service provided by Google LLC.

CRASHLYTICS.TITLE: Firebase Crashlytics
CRASHLYTICS.DESCRIPTION: Collects crashes of the app and passes them on to us so we can improve the app. Firebase Crashlytics is a service from Fabric.io (Alphabet Inc.).

SCOOTER.TITLE: Show E-Scooters and Bikes
SCOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Displays e-scooters (TIER, Circ, Voi) on the start page, and rental bikes (Nextbike) on the start page.

DATA_CHANGE.TITLE: Change data source
DATA_CHANGE.DESCRIPTION: Here you can select from which traffic association the data should come. When changing the traffic association, various features are deactivated.

PREVIEW.TITLE: View preview again
PREVIEW.DESCRIPTION: Take another look at the preview presented at the beginning.

ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Get to know the people who have given their best to create this app.

START.MESSAGE_1: Welcome to The Public Transport. To continue, please swipe to the left.
START.MESSAGE_2: We are The Public Transport. The first app for public transport in Flutter. But we are not just an app.
START.MESSAGE_3: We want to change public transport. The era of delays and unreliability should finally end! That is why we are building this app, and what you hold in your hands is just the beginning!
START.MESSAGE_4: We would like to integrate all means of transport into this app, and we will do so ! In as many countries as possible !
START.MESSAGE_5: For united public transport! We are The Public Transport
START.POPUP_1: This app has only just been released, and will probably contain some bugs.
START.POPUP_2: We ask you to report these bugs to us so we can fix them.
START.POPUP_3: We would like to thank all testers and contributors to The Public Transport. Without you we wouldn't be where we are today!
